title: Ascraeus Mons and Pavonis Mons
description: The location is between two large volcanos, named Ascraeus Mons and Pavonis Mons, in a dusty area of the Tharsis region of Mars. During the period from 2007 to 2012, winds blowing through the pass between the volcanoes darkened some regions and brightened others, probably by removing and depositing dust.
theme:
LIFELESS. Desert lands — if you value still
and silent beauty of the cosmos
